template_race.comment: vertical resize enabled, will need to turn off for IE

default.name: default
default.text: [PH]Orcs and Goblins are the scourge of the Old World. Orcs are built for violence; Goblins, by contrast, are smaller but more cunning. Collectively known as Greenskins, they are an aggressive and brutal race with an unquenchable love of fighting.

list_clip.comment: clip children disabled for release, will need to turn back on for IE
